descriptionHtml:
They are found in the Nightingale hall, if not type help - Kousei,Bug,Loridel,Erebus,Lyne,Renjamin, and Semmi
THESE FOLLOWERS ARE ESSENTIAL AND WILL NOT DIE, UNLESS EDITED.
This is based off my up and coming series called well, Marked Souls the series, simple enough it is a series based off a Guild in Guild wars 2. 
The followers can be modded to work better if needed, just post the updated file in comments.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKmGwMnjMZs
(Episode 2 - With followers)

I will note, these followers do not have voice files from the video.

If you want the most out of the mod, I suggest adding these mods:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563 - Coverwomen
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941 - CoverKhajiits
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709 - UNP Female Body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733 - Immersive Armors
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3395 - Evil Daedric Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9936 - The ENB uses, for both series and mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12525 - Dynavision
author: Vivaer
